AUTH_CHANGE_EMAIL_TTL_IN_MINUTES.description: Expiry time for a change email request, default is 1440 minutes(1 day)

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS Access Key for S3 storage.

AWS_QUERYSTRING_AUTH.description: Enables querystring auth for S3 urls

AWS_S3_FILE_OVERWRITE.description: Django Storages setting. By default files with the same name will overwrite each other. Set this to False to have extra characters appended.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS Secret Key for S3 storage.

CELERY_BROKER_URL.description: Where celery should get tasks, default is Redis URL

CELERY_RESULT_BACKEND.description: Where celery should put task results, default is Redis URL

CERTIFICATE_CREATION_WINDOW_IN_DAYS.description: The number of days a course run is eligible for certificate creation after it ends.

CLOUDFRONT_DIST.description: The Cloundfront distribution to use for static assets

CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS.description: Comma separated string of trusted domains that should be allowed for CORS

CORS_ALLOW_CREDENTIALS.description: Allow cookies to be sent in cross-site HTTP requests

CRON_COURSERUN_SYNC_DAYS.description: day_of_week' value for scheduled task to sync course run data (by default, it will run each day of the week).

CRON_COURSERUN_SYNC_HOURS.description: 'hours' value for scheduled task to sync course run data (by default, it will run at midnight

CRON_COURSE_CERTIFICATES_DAYS.description: 'day_of_week' value for 'generate-course-certificate' scheduled task (default will run once a day).

CRON_COURSE_CERTIFICATES_HOURS.description: 'hours' value for the 'generate-course-certificate' scheduled task (defaults to midnight)

CRON_ORPHAN_CHECK_DAYS.description: 'day_of_week' value for 'check-for-program-orphans' scheduled task (default will run once a day).

CRON_ORPHAN_CHECK_HOURS.description: 'hours' value for 'check-for-program-orphans' scheduled task (default will run at 3 AM).

CRON_PROCESS_REFUND_REQUESTS_MINUTES.description: minute value for scheduled task to process refund requests

CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS.description: Comma separated string of trusted domains that should be CSRF exempt

ECOMMERCE_DEFAULT_PAYMENT_GATEWAY.description: The default payment gateway to use. Must match the value of the constant in the mitol.payment_gateway library.

EDX_API_CLIENT_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout (in seconds) for requests made via the edX API client

FASTLY_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Optional token for the Fastly purge API.

FASTLY_URL.description: The URL to the Fastly API.

GOOGLE_DOMAIN_VERIFICATION_TAG_VALUE.description: The value of the meta tag used by Google to verify the owner of a domain (used for enabling push notifications)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The name of the review app

HUBSPOT_HOME_PAGE_FORM_GUID.description: Hubspot ID for the home page contact form

HUBSPOT_MAX_CONCURRENT_TASKS.description: Max number of concurrent Hubspot tasks to run

HUBSPOT_PIPELINE_ID.description: Hubspot ID for the ecommerce pipeline

HUBSPOT_TASK_DELAY.description: Number of milliseconds to wait between consecutive Hubspot calls

LOGOUT_REDIRECT_URL.description: Url to redirect to after logout, typically Open edX's own logout url

MAILGUN_BATCH_CHUNK_SIZE.description: Maximum number of emails to send in a batch

MAILGUN_KEY.description: The token for authenticating against the Mailgun API

MAILGUN_SENDER_DOMAIN.description: The domain to send mailgun email through

MEDIA_ROOT.description: The root directory for locally stored media. Typically not used.

MITOL_AUTHENTICATION_FROM_EMAIL.description: E-mail to use for the from field

MITOL_AUTHENTICATION_REPLY_TO_ADDRESS.description: E-mail to use for reply-to address of emails

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_ADMIN_EMAILS.description: This list of email addresses for the google service account authentication

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DATE_FORMAT.description: Python strptime format for date columns (no time) in enrollment management spreadsheets

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DATE_TIMEZONE.description: The name of the timezone that should be assumed for date/time values in spreadsheets. Choose from a value in the TZ database (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones).

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DEFERRALS_COMPLETED_.description: The zero-based index of the enrollment change sheet column that contains the row completion date

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DEFERRALS_ERROR_COL.description: The zero-based index of the enrollment change sheet column that contains row processing error messages

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DEFERRALS_FIRST_ROW.description: The first row (as it appears in the spreadsheet) of data that our scripts should consider processing in the deferral request spreadsheet

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DEFERRALS_PLUGINS.description: The path to your deferral plugin, example: app.plugins.DeferralPlugin

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DEFERRALS_PROCESSOR_.description: The zero-based index of the enrollment change sheet column that contains the user that processed the row

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DEFERRALS_REQUEST_WO.description: ID of the worksheet within the enrollment change request spreadsheet that contains enrollment deferral requests

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DEFERRALS_SKIP_ROW_C.description: The zero-based index of the enrollment change sheet column that indicates whether the row should be skipped

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DRIVE_API_PROJECT_ID.description: ID for the Google API project where the credentials were created

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DRIVE_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID from Google API credentials

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DRIVE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client secret from Google API credentials

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DRIVE_SERVICE_ACCOUN.description: The contents of the Service Account credentials JSON to use for Google API auth

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_DRIVE_SHARED_ID.description: ID of the Shared Drive (a.k.a. Team Drive). This is equal to the top-level folder ID.

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_ENROLLMENT_CHANGE_SH.description: ID of the Google Sheet that contains the enrollment change request worksheets (refunds, transfers, etc)

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_GOOGLE_ACCOUNT_EMAIL.description: Email domain of the google service account

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_PROCESSOR_APP_NAME.description: Name of the app processing the request

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_REFUNDS_COMPLETED_DA.description: The zero-based index of the enrollment change sheet column that contains the row completion date

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_REFUNDS_ERROR_COL.description: The zero-based index of the enrollment change sheet column that contains row processing error messages

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_REFUNDS_FIRST_ROW.description: The first row (as it appears in the spreadsheet) of data that our scripts should consider processing in the refund request spreadsheet

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_REFUNDS_PLUGINS.description: The path to your refund plugin, example: app.plugins.RefundPlugin

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_REFUNDS_PROCESSOR_CO.description: The zero-based index of the enrollment change sheet column that contains the user that processed the row

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_REFUNDS_REQUEST_WORK.description: ID of the worksheet within the enrollment change request spreadsheet that contains enrollment refund requests

MITOL_GOOGLE_SHEETS_REFUNDS_SKIP_ROW_COL.description: The zero-based index of the enrollment change sheet column that indicates whether the row should be skipped

MITOL_HUBSPOT_API_ID_PREFIX.description: The prefix to use for hubspot unique_app_id field values

MITOL_HUBSPOT_API_PRIVATE_TOKEN.description: Hubspot private token to authenticate with API

MITOL_HUBSPOT_API_RETRIES.description: Number of times to retry a failed hubspot API request

MITX_ONLINE_BASE_URL.description: Base url for the application in the format PROTOCOL://HOSTNAME[:PORT]

MITX_ONLINE_DB_CONN_MAX_AGE.description: Maximum age of connection to Postgres in seconds

MITX_ONLINE_DB_DISABLE_SSL.description: Disables SSL to postgres if set to True

MITX_ONLINE_EMAIL_BACKEND.description: The default email backend to use for outgoing email. This is used in some places by django itself. See `NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_BACKEND` for the backend used for most application emails.

MITX_ONLINE_ENVIRONMENT.description: The execution environment that the app is in (e.g. dev, staging, prod)

MITX_ONLINE_FROM_EMAIL.description: E-mail to use for the from field

MITX_ONLINE_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_BACKEND.description: The email backend to use for application emails

MITX_ONLINE_REFINE_MITX_ONLINE_DATASOURC.description: open exchange app id for fetching currency exchange rate

MITX_ONLINE_REFINE_OIDC_CONFIG_AUTHORITY.description: open exchange app id for fetching currency exchange rate

MITX_ONLINE_REFINE_OIDC_CONFIG_CLIENT_ID.description: open exchange app id for fetching currency exchange rate

MITX_ONLINE_REFINE_OIDC_CONFIG_REDIRECT_.description: Url to redirect the user to

MITX_ONLINE_REGISTRATION_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access token to secure Open edX registration API with

MITX_ONLINE_REPLY_TO_ADDRESS.description: E-mail to use for reply-to address of emails

MITX_ONLINE_SECURE_SSL_HOST.description: Hostame to redirect non-secure requests to. Overrides value from HOST header.

MITX_ONLINE_SITE_ID.description: The default site id for django sites framework

MITX_ONLINE_SUPPORT_EMAIL.description: Email address listed for customer support

MITX_ONLINE_USE_S3.description: Use S3 for storage backend (required on Heroku)

NODE_MODULES_CACHE.description: If false, disables the node_modules cache to fix yarn install

OAUTH2_PROVIDER_ALLOWED_REDIRECT_URI_SCH.description: List of schemes allowed for oauth2 redirect URIs

OPENEDX_API_BASE_URL.description: The base URL for the Open edX API

OPENEDX_API_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth2 client id to connect to Open edX with

OPENEDX_API_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The OAuth2 client secret to connect to Open edX with

OPENEDX_API_KEY.description: edX API key (EDX_API_KEY setting in Open edX)

OPENEDX_BASE_REDIRECT_URL.description: The base redirect URL for an OAuth Application for the Open edX API

OPENEDX_OAUTH_APP_NAME.description: The 'name' value for the Open edX OAuth Application

OPENEDX_RETIREMENT_SERVICE_WORKER_CLIENT.description: OAuth2 client id for retirement service worker
OAuth2 client secret for retirement service worker

OPENEDX_SERVICE_WORKER_API_TOKEN.description: Active access token with staff level permissions to use with OpenEdX API client for service tasks

OPENEDX_SERVICE_WORKER_USERNAME.description: Username of the user whose token has been set in OPENEDX_SERVICE_WORKER_API_TOKEN

OPENEDX_TOKEN_EXPIRES_HOURS.description: The number of hours until an access token for the Open edX API expires

OPEN_EXCHANGE_RATES_APP_ID.description: open exchange app id for fetching currency exchange rate

OPEN_EXCHANGE_RATES_URL.description: open exchange api url for fetching currency exchange rate

POSTHOG_API_TOKEN.description: API token to communicate with PostHog

POSTHOG_FEATURE_FLAG_REQUEST_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Timeout(MS) for PostHog feature flag requests.

POSTHOG_MAX_RETRIES.description: Numbers of time requests to PostHog should be retried after failing.

REPAIR_OPENEDX_USERS_FREQUENCY.description: How many seconds between repairing openedx records for faulty users

RETRY_FAILED_EDX_ENROLLMENT_FREQUENCY.description: How many seconds between retrying failed edX enrollments

ROBOTS_CACHE_TIMEOUT.description: How long the robots.txt file should be cached

SITE_NAME.description: Name of the site. e.g MITx Online

STATUS_TOKEN.description: Token to access the status API.

USE_X_FORWARDED_HOST.description: Set HOST header to original domain accessed by user
